description.full: The latest title in the hit action game series "DYNASTY WARRIORS" is finally here! With a brand new Renbu System, it delivers all of the fast-paced action of a kung-fu movie! Experience the thrill of being an army unto oneself with extreme action backed by entirely new character actions and graphics, and battlefields featuring dramatically enhanced realism and strategic thinking!
description.short: The latest title in the hit action game series "DYNASTY WARRIORS" is finally here! With a brand new Renbu System, it delivers all of the fast-paced action of a kung-fu movie! Experience the thrill of being an army unto oneself with extreme action backed by entirely new character actions and graphics, and battlefields featuring dramatically enhanced realism and strategic thinking!
